thread.title: Sprouts Farmers Market opens on Wednesday
thread.title_full: Sprouts Farmers Market opens on Wednesday

title: Sprouts Farmers Market opens on Wednesday

organizations.name: food bank of central & eastern north carolina

text:
Sprouts Farmers Market opens on Wednesday Tags: Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters More on this Sprouts mobile coupons 
The first area Sprouts Farmers Market grocery store is opening in Raleigh on Wednesday, March 15. 
They have super Grand Opening specials including asparagus for 88 cents/lb, cantaloupe for 88 cents each, ground beef for $1.99/lb and more! See below for the Grand Opening grocery specials from their sales flyer. 
Sprouts offers fresh, natural and organic groceries in a "setting that feels like an old-fashioned farmers market" according to their website. The specialty grocery store has over 250 stores in 13 states. Stores include produce, meat, seafood, deli, dairy, frozen, bulk bins, baked products, ready-to-eat meals, gourmet cheeses, gluten-free products, vitamins, health and beauty and more. 
Location: The new 30,000 square foot store is located at 9414 Falls of Neuse Road, Raleigh, NC, 27615, in the Olive Park shopping center. 
The store is open every day from 7 am - 10 pm. 
Opening Day Offers: The stores opens at 7 am with a ribbon-cutting, free samples and freebies. The first 200 customers will receive a 20% coupon and they will be giving away reusable bags. There will also be grand opening specials throughout the store all day. 
Mobile App: Download the mobile app to access digital coupons. Once you clip the coupons, you just show the barcode on the app at checkout. Mobile coupons are only good for one use each and they cannot be combined with paper coupons on the same product. Sprouts also offers Checkout Challenges which earn you discounts and free products when you make certain purchases. See more details on their website . 
Sprouts donates over 12 million meals by partnering with local food banks and hunger relief organizations. Here in Raleigh, they will be donating to the Food Bank of Central & Eastern North Carolina. Grand Opening Grocery Specials 
The following deals are valid March 15 - March 22, 2017 at their new Raleigh location. 
You can see the full ad on their website. 
Mangoes, various, 3 for $1 
Cucumbers, 3 for $1 
Green bell peppers, 3 for $1 
Green Beans, .88/lb
